items.sentence: Tom covered the table with the new tablecloth he\'d just bought.
My first job was at a travel agency, and I didn\'t like it much.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me about what happened. I already knew.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me anything, but he told me everything.
Tom didn\'t know Mary spoke French almost like a native speaker.
Tom didn\'t know exactly what it was that Mary wanted him to do.
Tom demanded to know why he hadn\'t been told about the changes.
Tom didn\'t begin to study French until he was thirty years old.
Tom didn\'t believe that Mary had anything to do with the theft.
Tom didn\'t have the slightest idea what Mary was talking about.
